'''Joan Tedeschi''' is a New York University Assistant Professor in the Linguistics Department and [[Ross Geller|Ross]]' date in episode "[[The One With All The Cheesecakes]]". She's attending Ross and [[Monica Geller|Monica]]'s [[cousin Frannie]]'s wedding, but finally Monica goes instead.

According to Ross, she is tall and very beautiful, and not broad-backed.
